text:
Example:   
8.2 Lactation- Risk Summary 
 Risk Summary 
Limited published literature based on breast milk sampling from 
five mothers, reports that [drugname] is present in human milk, 
which resulted in infant doses of 0.16% to 0.7% of the maternal 
weight-adjusted dosage and a milk/plasma ratio ranging between 
1.1 and 2.7. There are no reports of adverse effects on the breastfed 
infant and no effects on milk production. However, long-term 
neurodevelopmental effects on infants from stimula
